refbody.section: PurposeDisplay all volume and partition information about the system.

ul.li: This command shows both managed and unmanaged types of volumes and partitions.
Unmanaged partitions does not show the encryption information.
Unmanaged partitions is shown as offline if the mount point does not exist.

refbody.section: ExampleShow all volume details.Console> status volume Storage Volume Status: Volume 'raid0' is [Online] : size = 285148 MB, num partitions = 2 Partition 1 'raid0-1' is [Online], encryption is [None] Total size = 91 MB, free size = 86 MB Partition 2 'raid0-2' is [Online], encryption is [None] Total size = 184 MB, free size = 179 MB Console>
